Text: RE From PwC TLSHarpreet Arora Cc Harry Please forward your completed return to my attention at Louisiana Ste Houston TX We will prepare your tax equalization calculation and forward to the company for approval Many Thanks Julianne Arora Harry Harry NRONcom on PM To Enron Houston IAS cc Subject RE From PwC TLSHarpreet Arora I have already filed my tax returns Give me a call if you want to discuss further Thanks Harry Arora Original Message From ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESCassigneeEnotificationusEpwcglobalEcom E NRONcom Sent Tuesday April PM To Arora Harry Subject From PwC TLSHarpreet Arora Dear Harpreet The April tax filing deadline is less than a week away and according to our records we show we have not yet received your completed tax data organizer This note serves as confirmation that on your behalf we will request an extension of time to file your federal tax return The extension will be automatically granted and the new due date for your tax return will be August Please note if you are currently residing overseas your tax return is not due until June th Should we require additional time to prepare your tax return an extension will be requested at that time State Extensions If you have an obligation to file a state tax return YOU MUST notify us so we may prepare the state extension We will not know whether individuals have state filing obligations without seeing their detailed tax information so we ask that you please notify us of any needs for state extensions Please send your state extension requests to If we do not hear from you in this regard we will file only a Federal extension request on your behalf Please be assured that we will continue to very work hard to complete as many tax returns as possible in time for April filing but that any that are not completed will get federal extensions If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact us If you believe this note has been sent to you in error please notify us as soon as possible Best regards The PwC Enron Team If you have any question Please Contact Tax Contact Enron Houston EMail Only The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer
